name: SmartLOX
description: SmartLOX is part of the world's first blockchain mobile security network, LOX Network and brings a revolutionary proof-of-ownership use case to NFTs. SmartLOX is an NFT representation of your mobile phone's identifying characteristics and makes up one half of the proof-of-ownership model. The SmartLOX token governs the SmartLOX mobile application where users can register their personal devices and even sell them to each other using a QR coded NFT proving the rightful owner, making it easy to track ownership on the LOX Network mobile or web app
